name: Motion Time Lapser
short_description:
Motion Time Lapser is a software that will allow you to add motion to your static time lapses. 
You have several options to change the cropping that will be apply to your pictures. This cropping rectangle can change dynamically adding the motion sensation.
You can also change the rotation of the pictures, select constant speed, acceleration or deceleration and resize the final pictures. 
Taking every X pictures of the folder will increase the speed of the final time lapse. 
This software doesn't edit or show images. It doesn't create the final video time lapse.
summary: Add motion to your time lapses with this dynamic cropping tool.
